MemeDef.label: craftsmanship
MemeDef.description: Creation is the greatest virtue. To add is better than to subtract.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->[deity0_name] created all of nature, and gave it to man as a gift.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->The people fought with the beasts of the forest, and [deity0_name] cast them from [deity0_possessive] kingdom.
setup(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->[founderName] built a colony on a green world, and created great works.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->Once, [founderName] saw a man kick a dog. [founder_pronoun] ordered the man killed on the spot.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->I visited a well-run farm full of healthy animals and thriving crops. It was obvious that
lesson(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->living free of violence leads to prosperity
archistBasis(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->Archotechs are machines of vast will and power, but only humanity could create them.
archistFact(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->Humans are the device-makers, and the archotechs are their devices.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->[inTheEnd], by observing humanity, the archotechs will finally understand their purpose, and lift confident humanity up to rule them.
animistFact(tag=meme_Craftsmanship) ->Nature's animals should not be harmed.
